hero.subtitle: Simplify your daily life, we take care of the rest. Fast, reliable, and spotless service.

slider.team_subtitle: Trained and vetted staff for your safety.
slider.eco_subtitle: Protecting the environment and your family's health.

features.title: Why JadaClean?
features.f1_text: A trained team equipped with the best products for a spotless result.
features.f2_text: We operate according to your schedule, 7 days a week for your comfort.
features.f3_text: Insured services and 100% satisfaction guaranteed with every visit.

process.title: How it works?
process.step1_text: Online or by phone in less than 2 minutes.
process.step2_text: We intervene on the agreed date with our professional equipment.
process.step3_text: Enjoy your own sparkling and healthy space.

footer.description: High-precision cleaning experts for individuals and businesses. JadaClean transforms your spaces with excellence.

about.title: Professional Cleaning Excellence
about.subtitle: Cleaning excellence at your service
about.description: JadaClean Enterprise S.R.L., based in Afumați, redefines cleaning standards in Romania. Our mission is to improve workplace productivity and home comfort through impeccable environments.

tech.title: Technology & Ecology
tech.content: We use only the best for your health. Our Kärcher and Ghibli equipment with HEPA filtration eliminates allergens while protecting the environment.

safety.title: Safety & Transparency
safety.content: Every member of our team is rigorously trained and has a clean criminal record. We operate with full liability insurance for your peace of mind.

services_detail.title: Total Flexibility
services_detail.content: From studios to villas, or corporate headquarters, we adapt our schedules and methods to your specific needs.

award.title: Recognized Growth
award.content: Recognized in the 'Top 100 Cleaning Companies in Romania', JadaClean stands out for its rigor and consistent quality.

success.title: It's done, {{name}}!
success.description: Your booking for the service <1>{{service}}</1> has been successfully validated.
success.contact: A JadaClean agent will contact you shortly.
success.noteText: A payment receipt has been sent to your email address. Keep it safe for your appointment.
